keyEvents.title: Final Battle Between Luffy and Krieg
keyEvents.description: The climactic battle between Luffy and Don Krieg takes place on the Baratie's fin, resulting in Krieg's defeat and the end of the invasion.
keyEvents.significance: The Baratie is finally freed from the Krieg Pirates' threat, allowing it to return to normal operations.

keyEvents.title: Krieg Pirates Depart from Baratie
keyEvents.description: Under Gin's orders, the defeated Krieg Pirates retreat from the Baratie restaurant, ending their occupation.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the official end of the Baratie Arc's conflict and the restaurant's liberation.

description: A floating restaurant ship in the East Blue, known for its excellent food and fighting cooks.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Emotional Breakdown on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Nami cries alone on the stolen Going Merry, expressing her desire for freedom and mentioning Bell-mère.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry becomes the setting for Nami's emotional turmoil and foreshadowing of her backstory.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, currently stolen by Nami who is sailing it away from the crew.
